sentence.Network_en: Rather unromantically, the structure he chose was the humble pineal gland.
sentence.Network_cn: 相当平淡无奇的是, 这个结构,他选择的是地位低的松果腺.

sentence.Network_en: We got married, rather unromantically, in a dingy office in the town hall.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在市政厅的一间昏暗的办公室里结婚了, 一点也不浪漫.

list.abs: they have developed a distinctly unromantic formula to predict how compatible a couple are based on their ages , education and previous divorces .他们开发了一个很平常的公式来预测一对合适的夫妻是怎样建立在他们的年龄、教育程度和之前是否离婚上的。
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U2) ... unrobe 脱外衣 unromantic 平淡无奇的 unroof 除去屋顶.
sway 摇摆unromantic 平庸的vibrancy 活力

for the typical global couple , such high-profile , big-money cases matter less than the three basic ( and deeply unromantic factors ) in marriage planning .对于典型的跨国夫妇看说，关于婚姻生活筹划的基本三要素（并且很平庸的因素)要比这种高姿态吹嘘、牵涉巨额财产的案例更为重要。

sentences.sentence: "we got married, rather unromatically, in a dingy office in the town hall"
